text: Kukurantumi is a town in the East Akim District of the Eastern Region of Ghana, noted for Adonten Senior High School , Ofori panin High School ,Only Believe Senior High Technical School , Bright School High ,Christian Heritage High School,Saint Paul High School Kukurantumi is the district head of Abuakwa North Municipalities and also the St. Paul's Technical Institute. ==References== ==See also== Category:Populated places in the Eastern Region (Ghana) classic recording studio is located in kukurantumi
title: Kukurantumi
